dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents the time zones of the world. The time zones are best displayed with World Countries or World Administrative Divisions. This layer is part of the 2014 ESRI Data and Maps collection for ArcGIS 10.2.World Time Zones provides time zones for countries and the cities within them. Note that daylight saving time is not shown.
